page.title: 02SERVICES IN CLUNTON
page.content: There is a bus service from Clun to Craven Arms and another to Bishop's Castle which passes through the block along the main road. There is also a service to Shrewsbury. During the summer orgainized trips to the coast and other places of interest are available. {LIBRARY VAN.}This calls every fortnight in Clunton {DUSTBINS.}These are emptied once a fortnight. {BREAD AND GROCERIES.}Deliveries of home baked bread and groceries are delivered once a week. {MILK.}Its delivered five days a week by van. {MEAT.}Its delivered by order from the Clun butchers. {COAL AND BOILER FUEL.}Regular fortnightly deliveries or to order.
